A/DT hundred/CD years,/NNS to/TO be/VB sure,/RB is/VBZ a/DT good/JJ while;/NN but/CC though/IN fashions/NNS have/VBP changed,/VBN some/DT old/JJ phrases/NNS dropped/VBD out,/RB and/CC new/JJ ones/NNS come/VBP in;/RB and/CC snuff/RB and/CC hair-powder,/JJ and/CC sacques/NNS and/CC solitaires/NNS quite/RB passed/VBD away--yet/JJ men/NNS and/CC women/NNS were/VBD men/NNS and/CC women/NNS all/RB the/DT same--as/JJ elderly/JJ fellows,/NN like/IN your/PRP$ humble/JJ servant,/NN who/WP have/VBP seen/VBN and/CC talked/VBN with/IN rearward/JJ stragglers/NNS of/IN that/DT generation--now/JJ all/DT and/CC long/JJ marched/VBD off--can/JJ testify,/NNS if/IN they/PRP will./MD In/IN those/DT days/NNS Chapelizod/NNP was/VBD about/IN the/DT gayest/NN and/CC prettiest/NN of/IN the/DT outpost/NN villages/NNS in/IN which/WDT old/JJ Dublin/NNP took/VBD a/DT complacent/JJ pride./NN The/DT poplars/NNS which/WDT stood,/VBD in/IN military/JJ rows,/NN here/RB and/CC there,/RB just/RB showed/VBD a/DT glimpse/NN of/IN formality/NN among/IN the/DT orchards/NNS and/CC old/JJ timber/NN that/WDT lined/VBD the/DT banks/NNS of/IN the/DT river/NN and/CC the/DT valley/NN of/IN the/DT Liffey,/NNP with/IN a/DT lively/JJ sort/NN of/IN richness./NNP The/DT broad/JJ old/JJ street/NN looked/VBD hospitable/JJ and/CC merry,/JJ with/IN steep/JJ roofs/NNS and/CC many/JJ coloured/JJ hall-doors./, The/DT jolly/JJ old/JJ inn,/NN just/RB beyond/IN the/DT turnpike/NN at/IN the/DT sweep/NN of/IN the/DT road,/NN leading/VBG over/IN the/DT buttressed/VBN bridge/NN by/IN the/DT mill,/NNS was/VBD first/JJ to/TO welcome/VB the/DT excursionist/NN from/IN Dublin,/NNP under/IN the/DT sign/NN of/IN the/DT Phoenix./NNP There,/NNP in/IN the/DT grand/JJ wainscoted/VBD back-parlour,/NN with/IN 'the/PRP great/JJ and/CC good/JJ King/NNP William,'/NNP in/IN his/PRP$ robe,/NN garter,/NN periwig,/NN and/CC sceptre/NN presiding/VBG in/IN the/DT panel/NN over/IN the/DT chimneypiece,/NN and/CC confronting/VBG the/DT CHAPTER/NNP XII./NNP SOME/NNP ODD/NNP FACTS/NNP ABOUT/NNP THE/DT TILED/NNP HOUSE--BEING/NNP AN/DT AUTHENTIC/NNP NARRATIVE/NNP OF/IN THE/DT GHOST/NN OF/IN A/DT HAND./NNP I'm/NNP sure/JJ she/PRP
